column7: description
Unique identifier for the analysis performed for a particular set of samples
Unique identifier for the analyzed sample
Unique identifier for the mutation
Type of mutation
Name of the chromosome containing the mutation/variation
Start position of the mutation/variation on the chromosome
End position of the mutation/variation on the chromosome
Chromosome strand
RefSNP alleles from dbSNP (use a dash for each missing base)
Strand of RefSNP allele
Allele in the reference genome (use a dash for each missing base)
Genotype of the control sample (use a dash for each missing base)
Genotype of the tumour sample (use a dash for each missing base)
Mutation, e.g. C > G
The expressed allele(s) as revealed by RNA-seq, etc.
Average quality score for the mutation/variation call
Probability of the mutation/variation call
Average number of times the bases are covered by raw reads
Indicate if the mutation/variation is annotated in dbSNP
Indicate if the mutation/variation has been validated
Platform or technology used in validation
Cross-reference: Ensembl Variation ID from Ensembl Variation database.
Optional field to leave notes
